intro: Rescue the stranded in this addictive puzzler
description:
Set sail for a puzzling adventure in Island Rescue a vibrant and strategic puzzle game.

Stranded on a mysterious island, colorful characters need your help to reach their matching boats. Your mission? Clear the path and guide the right people to their boats in the correct order. Each boat requires three people of the same color to board before it can set sail. Think ahead and plan your moves carefully—only the most resourceful players will succeed in rescuing everyone!

Strategically maneuver characters across the island to match them with their boats.

Progress through increasingly complex puzzles as the game introduces exciting obstacles such as:

Stone Blockers: Clear obstacles using characters equipped with pickaxes.

Storm Clouds: Navigate around these tricky hazards that block your path.

Bridge Buttons: Activate hidden bridges to open new routes and solve the puzzle.

Expanding Challenges: Levels get bigger and more intricate, testing your logic and planning skills.

With its colorful characters, clever mechanics, and endless fun, Island Rescue is perfect for puzzle enthusiasts of all ages. Can you guide every castaway to safety and master the island's challenges?
